ui.subtitle: Eat what?
ui.reassurance: Choose whatever your body can handle today lah.

chicken-rice.name: Chicken Rice
chicken-rice.tip: The cucumber helps to make the meal not so jelak.

fish-soup.name: Fish Soup
fish-soup.tip: Clear soup very shiok, easy for the stomach.

yong-tau-foo.name: Yong Tau Foo
yong-tau-foo.tip: Tofu and veggies all very soft, eat already won't feel bloated.

options.light: Soup base with fresh tofu and greens
options.avoid: Laksa soup or mostly fried items

ban-mian.name: Ban Mian
ban-mian.tip: Add more spinach, the soup will feel more balanced.

options.avoid: Dry style with extra chilli and fried ikan bilis

nasi-lemak.name: Nasi Lemak
nasi-lemak.tip: Cucumber and egg give nice contrast in texture.

options.light: Plain rice with ikan bilis, egg, and cucumber
options.caution: Coconut rice with otah and chicken wing
options.avoid: Coconut rice with extra sambal and fried stuff

wanton-mee.name: Wanton Mee
wanton-mee.tip: Must eat with soup, then noodles won't be so dry.

options.avoid: Dry version with extra sauce and fried wanton

carrot-cake.name: Carrot Cake
carrot-cake.tip: White carrot cake taste lighter, not so heavy.

options.light: White one with more egg, less oil

economical-rice.name: Economical Rice
economical-rice.tip: Steamed dishes usually easier to eat.

options.avoid: Many fried dishes or heavy gravy on rice

laksa.name: Laksa
laksa.tip: Drink the soup slowly, can enjoy the spices better.

options.avoid: More soup or add fried toppings

bak-chor-mee.name: Bak Chor Mee
bak-chor-mee.tip: The vinegar helps to cut the richness, very shiok.

options.light: Soup version with minced meat and mushrooms

vision.title: The Vision
vision.content: Eating at hawker centres is our Singaporean lifestyle, but sometimes can feel very stressful or got 'health guilt'. Eat Outside is here to help you enjoy our hawker food with less worry, more shiok.

philosophy.title: Our Philosophy
philosophy.content: , not restriction. You no need to stop eating your favourite food to feel better. We don't count calories or use medical terms. We just give simple suggestions to make your meal feel lighter.

howTo.title: How to Use This
howTo.content: Think of this like a friend giving you suggestions. Pick your dish and see the options. Whether you choose Safe, Steady, or Better Don't totally depends on how you feel today lah—no right or wrong answer.

notMedical.title: Not Medical Advice
notMedical.content: The information here is just for guidance only. We are not doctors. Suggestions are based on common cooking methods and general feeling only.

listenBody.title: Listen to Your Body
listenBody.content: Everyone's body is different. Please listen to your own body, follow your medical needs, and listen to your doctor's advice.

allergies.title: Allergies & Safety
allergies.content: Must always check with the auntie/uncle at the stall about ingredients and allergies. Recipes can change anytime one.
